alicexz:

Look for this huge banner at my Artist Alley tables! My next con will be Anime Expo (TABLE E19) in LA (July 3-6), hope to see some of you there! Will have the usual prints, postcards, and buttons.

This year I might also do some raffles, for original drawings or fine art prints! I was thinking maybe $1 to enter a ticket outright, but you get an additional free ticket for every $5 spent at my tableâ¦ or something. Iâd announce winning ticket (online) on the last day of the con, and the winner(s) can either pick up if theyâre still around, or I can mail them the prize. Thoughts or suggestions? Would this be something you con-attendees would be interested in?
